title: Enakkaga Poranthaye Lyrics Pannaiyarum Padminiyum Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Enakkaga Poranthaye
Singer(s): S.P.B.Charan, Anu Anand
Movie: Pannaiyarum Padminiyum
Music: Justin Prabhakaran

Enakkaga Poranthaye enathazhagi
irupene manasellaam unnai ezhudhi

Enakkaga Poranthaye enathazhagi
irupene manasellaam unnai ezhudhi

Unakku maalayittu varusanga pona enna
pogadhu unnoda paasam
ennaku emmelathaan aasayilla
ummelathaan vachen
endha oosi indri
noolum indri unnodathaan thachen

Unakkaaga porandheney enathazhagaa
piriyama irupene pagal iravaa
unakku vaakkapattu varusanga pona enna
pogaadhu unndoa paasam
ennaku emmelathaan aasayilla
ummelathaan vachen
endha oosi indri
noolum indri unnodathaan thachen.

Odhungaadey thottu
usupethi vittu
unakaa oovoru madhiri
naakkula nenjula pachaya kuthi vachen.

Idhudhaandhi radham
idhuvethaan nelam
unnathaan otkaaravchi naan
rasaadhi raasaa naan oorgolam vandhidiven.

Aathoram kaathaadum
kaathodu naathaadum.
naan paathaatamaa, naathaatamaa ..
un nizhalum naalum
nee maalaydum velai idhu
ketkudhu yen thozhu ...

Unakkaaga porandheney enathazhagaa
piriyama irupene pagal iravaa
Unakku maalayittu varusanga pona enna
pogadhu unnoda paasam
